sentences.en: But as our brains grew our jawbone structure changed, leaving us expensively overcrowded mouths.
sentences.cn: 但是因为大脑影响了下颚的结构, 让我们只好长了一嘴拥挤的牙齿了.

sentences.en: Finding a fresh jawbone of a donkey, he grabbed it and struck down a thousand men.
sentences.cn: 15他见一块未干的驴腮骨, 就伸手拾起来,用以击杀一千人.

sentences.en: Finding a jawbone of a donkey, he grabbed it and struck down a thousand men.
sentences.cn: 他见一块未乾的驴腮骨, 就伸手拾起来,用以击杀一千人.

sentences.en: Having teeth attached to the edge of the jawbone without sockets.
sentences.cn: 长有颌缘牙的、端生齿的动物.

sentences.en: Objective To study stress distribution in jawbone tissues around dental implant under displacement constraints.
sentences.cn: 目的研究指定位移约束对颌骨的应力分布影响.

sentences.en: Stop looking at the jawbone as your finish line.
sentences.cn: 当你到终线时就停止看颌骨.

sentences.en: The hardest bone in the human body is the jawbone.
sentences.cn: 人体最硬的骨头是下颚骨(颔骨)?

sentences.en: When he finished speaking, he threw away the jawbone; and the place was called Ramath Lehi.
sentences.cn: 17说完这话 、 就把那 腮 骨从手里抛出去了.那地便叫拉末利希.

trans.tran_en: one of the bones that your teeth are in, especially the lower bone
